page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content:
Quite a lot of types of{Transport}use this area and there are some which you are not likely to find in the middle of London like tractors usually use the road.Most people have a car around here.I think a car is the best peice of transport to have here because lots of people work in Exeter and it is cheaper by car than by bus.Also Broadclyst isn't well served by public Transport.The only good road systems around here are the Motorway and the main road to Exeter.Most people's Mums and Dads have a car.
To drive a car you need a key to turn it on,3 pedals (an accelerator,a clutch and a brake),a gear stick to change gear and a steering wheel to steer it with. {BY. GARETH EDWARDS { ---- ------ --------
